name: Passage Assassination
description:
After a dinner party gone wrong, you have been trapped in your uncle's mansion.  It turns out he owes some money to the wrong people, and they put a hit out on him.  Now he's set you up to take the fall.  Assassins are sneaking into his mansion through its secret passages.  You must find them and board them up to stay alive!

Made for the University of North Texas Game Developer's Club Game Jam in April 2021.
